title: Lego Pewku with Takua (8595)
description: Help Takua find the Seventh Toa! Takua the Chronicler is on his most dangerous quest. With his best friend Jaller, he is searching the island of Mata Nui for the mysterious Toa of Light. His trusted Ussal crab, Pewku, helps him stay one step ahead of Makuta and the Rahkshi. Move Pewku backward and forward on a flat surface and his crab legs move in a crawling motion! Combine with sets 8593 and 8594 to build Makuta Nui! Contains 221 pieces. For ages 8 and up.
